name: attribution
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of saying or thinking that something is the result or work of a particular person or thing: The usual attribution of the work to Leonardo is now disputed by several experts.

Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of saying what the origin or cause of something is: He borrowed from other people’s writing without attribution.
